translation.en: Hey, Gibson. Come over here, mate.
Whoa. You still lugging that thing around?
Hey, I'm gonna be ready when Zorah Magdaros finally shows itself.
translation.es: Estaré listo cuando el Zorah Magdaros por fin aparezca.

translation.en: I mean, you really think you're gonna kill a walking volcano monster with that?
translation.es: ¿Crees que matarás a un monstruo volcánico con eso?

translation.en: This thing can supposedly level cities with a wag of its tail.
translation.es: Dicen que puede destruir ciudades con solo mover la cola.

translation.en: Gibson, if half the rumors are true,
you may wanna count yourself lucky that it hasn't shown itself yet.
translation.es: deberías agradecer que aún no haya aparecido.

translation.en: - We're the Fifth Fleet. Best of the best! - I'll drink to that!
translation.es: - Somos la 5.ª flota. ¡Los mejores! - ¡Brindaré por eso!

translation.en: Zorah Magdaros had better keep its head underwater
translation.es: El Zorah Magdaros debería seguir oculto,

translation.en: because no one's met the monster that can handle Hunters like us.
translation.es: porque no hay monstruo que estos cazadores no puedan vencer.

translation.en: - - I have.
- - I faced an Elder Dragon.
You have no idea what we're up against.
translation.es: Ni se imaginan a qué nos enfrentamos.

translation.en: Come on!
Whoa! Aw, come on.
Lucky catch.
Enjoy your breakfast!
Morning, Mrs. Bellflower.
Morning, Aiden. You're out early.
You know what they say. The early Kut- Ku catches the Konchu.
translation.es: Como dice el refrán: Al Kut-Ku que madruga, el Konchu ayuda.

translation.en: I did not know they said that. You and your monsters.
translation.es: No conocía ese refrán. Tú y tus monstruos.

translation.en: Nice- lookin' catch, Aiden.
How about a Gastronome Tuna for some Poogie Jammies?
translation.es: ¿Un trueque de atún glotón por pijamas de Poogie?

translation.en: Not gonna happen!
- Watch where you're going, Loke. - Whoa! Nice move, Aiden.
translation.es: - Fíjate por donde vas, Loke. - Buenos reflejos.

translation.en: - You must be practicing. - You better believe it.
Thanks again for clearing out those Bnahabra.
translation.es: Gracias por encargarte de esos Bnahabra.

translation.en: Hopefully, these patches'll keep 'em out for good.
translation.es: Esperemos que esto los mantenga alejados.

translation.en: Always Bna- happy to help.
Hey, have you seen Farmer Burl?
Ooh! Ebbi's been waiting for you there all morning.
translation.es: Ebbi te ha estado esperando toda la mañana.

translation.en: Something's gotten in Farmer Burl's coops.
translation.es: Hay algo en el corral de Burl.

translation.en: - Come on. We gotta go. It's a real quest! -
What if it's Rathalos? Did you know that Rathalos have poisonous claws?
translation.es: ¿Será un Rathalos? ¿Sabías que tiene garras venenosas?

translation.en: - Yeah? - One scratch, and you're a goner.
I kinda doubt a Rathalos got into Farmer Burl's Gargwa coops.
translation.es: Dudo que haya un Rathalos en el corral de Gargwa.

translation.en: I'd bring some antidotes anyway.
translation.es: Tendría antídotos a mano si fuera tú.

translation.en: Yes.
Mrs. Genovan, look.
Is that my cast- iron skillet?
Just finished putting the new fence in last week, and now look at it.
translation.es: Puse la nueva cerca la semana pasada y mira nada más.

translation.en: Tracks.
Velociprey, I think.
Can you take care of it?
Mr. Burl, you called the Right- noplos guy for the job.
translation.es: Sr. Burl, soy el indicado, noplo-blema.

translation.en: Because Rhenoplos, it's a…
With the horn? Never mind.
It's fresh.
That's no Velociprey.
Come on!
Yes!
That… That was close.
You're fortunate the Velocidrome was alone. They usually hunt with a pack of Velociprey.
translation.es: Suerte que el Velocidrome estaba solo. Suelen cazar con una manada de Velociprey.

translation.en: Yikes. The tracks I was following were a Velociprey's.
Didn't think I'd be running into its big brother.
translation.es: No creí que vería a su hermano mayor.

translation.en: Are you a Hunter?
You are, aren't you?
Like, a real Guild Hunter.
The last time one came through Timben, I was, like, nine years old.
translation.es: La última vez que uno vino a Timben, tenía como nueve años.

translation.en: This is so cool. I'm a Hunter too.
I mean, well, I've never actually hunted something that can hunt back before, but…
translation.es: Bueno, jamás cacé un depredador, pero…

translation.en: - I'm Aiden, by the way. - My name is Julius.
translation.es: - Soy Aiden, por cierto. - Me llamo Julius.

translation.en: You shouldn't be hunting without a license from the Hunter's Guild.
translation.es: No deberías cazar sin la licencia del gremio de cazadores.

translation.en: - It's poaching. - I… Well…
One of them Velociprey…
What are you doing?
One does not take a monster's life lightly.
translation.es: Uno no toma la vida de un monstruo a la ligera.

translation.en: To do so would betray the balance of nature.
translation.es: Sería traicionar el equilibrio de la naturaleza.

translation.en: A Hunter has an obligation to see its sacrifice does not go to waste.
translation.es: Debo asegurarme de que su sacrificio no haya sido en vano.

translation.en: Now, this village you're from, it's nearby?
I'm not in trouble, am I?
I mean, you killed it, right? So…
translation.es: Es decir, tú lo mataste, ¿no? Así que…

translation.en: Here's the thing. The last time one of the villagers got an Altaroth infestation in their basement,
translation.es: Escucha, la última vez que un aldeano tuvo una plaga de Altaroth en el sótano,

translation.en: Mitul had to walk all the way to Dundorma. It took two weeks!
translation.es: Mitul debió caminar hasta Dundorma. ¡Le tomó dos semanas!

translation.en: And then, when we finally met with the Hunter's Guild,
translation.es: Y cuando hablamos con el gremio,

translation.en: they'd never even heard of our village before.
There's no way we can go for help every time a Kelbi gets into the Cudgel Onion patch.
translation.es: No podemos pedir ayuda cada vez que un Kelbi entra a la aldea.

translation.en: Ah. So you take it upon yourself to sort things out.
translation.es: Así que tú te encargas de resolverlo.

translation.en: I'm actually pretty good at this stuff.
Are these the Velociprey tracks you were following?
translation.es: ¿Estas son las huellas de Velociprey que seguías?

translation.en: Yep. Those are them. Somebody's still gotta deal with that.
translation.es: Sí, así es. Alguien tendrá que ocuparse de eso.

translation.en: These are fake.
What?
And from the looks of it,
you have a Melynx to thank for all your troubles.
Oh. When I find him, I'm gonna--
Aiden, later. The village first.
translation.es: Aiden, no es momento. Vamos a la aldea.

translation.en: But…  This isn't over.
Is there someone who makes decisions for the village?
translation.es: ¿Hay alguien a cargo de la aldea?

translation.en: Elder Daazel. She's a Wyverian.
Lived here longer than there's been a village.
translation.es: Lleva más tiempo aquí que la aldea.

translation.en: She's in the building with Huskberry bushes out front.
translation.es: Su casa está junto al árbol de baya hueca. Puedo llevarte.

translation.en: - I can show you where it is. - I'll find my way. Take this.
translation.es: Su casa está junto al árbol de baya hueca. Puedo llevarte. La encontraré solo. Toma.

translation.en: - - Holy moly!
Keep an eye on that for me, would you, Ebbi?
I'll be back shortly.
Give it a rest, Feathers. I'm not quite ready for you yet.
translation.es: Cállense. Aún no es su turno.

translation.en: Mm! A little Felvine for flavor.
Don't you move. You're gonna pay for what you've done.
translation.es: Quieto. Pagarás por lo que hiciste.

translation.en: Why, certainly, good sir. Uh, how much do I owe you?
translation.es: Claro que sí, señor. ¿Cuánto te debo?

translation.en: You're a… Wait, you can talk?
I thought wild Melynx only spoke Melynx or whatever.
translation.es: Creí que los Melynx salvajes hablaban Melynx o…

translation.en: Meowst do, uh, that's true. But I'm not as wild as some.
translation.es: Sí que sí. Pero no soy muy salvaje.

translation.en: I'm a merchant.
Nox is the name.
Really? Then what are you doing with Farmer Burl's-- ?
Why, you-- Ow!
Oh my--
Yeah, just put that anywhere.
Just don't hit the--
Oh! Come on!
- That is precious cargo. - Ow!
That was a limited- edition pot!
- What kind of-- Oh, real nice. -
You meowster!
Come back here, you furry little felon!
I don't suppose I could interest you in an array of secondhand commodities?
translation.es: ¿Te interesaría una gran variedad de artículos de segunda mano?

translation.en: All right, 15, uh, 20%, but that is the best I can do.
translation.es: Bueno, te daré una rebaja del 15 al 20 %, pero eso es todo.

translation.en: For the last time, I'm not interested in your Zenny.
translation.es: Por última vez, no me interesa tu zeni.

translation.en: Your Zenny. Listen to me, buying into this Bullfango.
translation.es: Como si fuera tuyo. Son puras Bullfango-chadas.

translation.en: - Unnecessary. - You're a thief.
I'm a Hunter, and bringing you in is gonna prove to that Guild know- it- all that I can protect my village.
translation.es: Soy cazador. Contigo, podré demostrarle al gremio que puedo proteger a mi aldea.

translation.en: Oh, I get it. You're a protector.
- You protect. - That's right.
Hear me out.
How much more effective would you be as a protector
if you could just protect them with your very own airship?
translation.es: si pudieras proteger a tu aldea con tu propia nave?

translation.en: Now, I… I know a guy…
Hi.
Well, Mr. Burl, I've solved your problem.
I think you'll be pleased to have these back.
- My Gargwa! - Nice, Aiden.
Heck of a good job, son.
- - And the thief responsible.
Uh, hello.
Yeah, Aiden!
Still think I shouldn't be hunting? - Yes. -
translation.es: - ¿Aún crees que no debería cazar? - Sí.

translation.en: - Oof. - What's all this?
I was just explaining that your village lies in the path of an Elder Dragon.
translation.es: Estaba explicando que tu aldea está en el camino de un dragón anciano.

translation.en: What?
What does that mean?
Nothing good.
The Elder Dragons are the most ancient and powerful of monster kind.
translation.es: Los dragones ancianos son los monstruos más antiguos y fuertes.

translation.en: Once enraged, incredible energy flows from them,
translation.es: Si están enfurecidos, liberan una gran energía

translation.en: warping ecosystems in the places where they live.
translation.es: que destruye los ecosistemas de los sitios donde viven.

translation.en: For the most part, these creatures remain in one place.
translation.es: Por lo general, permanecen en un solo lugar.

translation.en: However, during the periodic migration,
translation.es: Sin embargo, durante la migración de los ancianos,

translation.en: called the Elder Crossing, they migrate across the continent
translation.es: Sin embargo, durante la migración de los ancianos, viajan por el continente y sobre el gran océano,

translation.en: and over the great ocean,
translation.es: viajan por el continente y sobre el gran océano,

translation.en: leaving a path of destruction in their wake.
translation.es: y destruyen todo a su paso.

translation.en: Based on our reports, we now believe they are all headed to the same location
translation.es: Nuestros informes indican que se dirigen hacia el mismo lugar sobre el mar,

translation.en: over the sea, but we don't know why.
translation.es: Nuestros informes indican que se dirigen hacia el mismo lugar sobre el mar, pero no sabemos por qué.

translation.en: For most of recorded history, these events were extraordinarily rare.
translation.es: Durante la mayor parte de la historia, estos eventos no eran nada frecuentes.

translation.en: - - One in a century was uncommon.
translation.es: A veces, no sucedían ni en un siglo.

translation.en: It's now happening once every decade.
translation.es: Y ahora suceden en cada década.

translation.en: Ten years ago, the Guild summoned Hunters to Port Tanzia to join a Fleet.
translation.es: Hace diez años, el gremio envió cazadores a Puerto Tanzia para unirse a una flota.

translation.en: Their mission? To find the cause of the more frequent migrations.
translation.es: Su misión era descubrir por qué había migraciones tan seguido.

translation.en: Hunters, like myself, have been dispatched by the Hunter's Guild to search for signs of the next migration.
translation.es: El gremio envió a cazadores como yo a buscar señales de la próxima migración.

translation.en: I am here to tell you an Elder Dragon is on its migration path,
translation.es: Vine a advertirles que un dragón anciano migratorio

translation.en: straight for your village.
translation.es: se dirige directo a su aldea.

translation.en: Holy moly.
You must evacuate now.
Wait a minute. You expect us to just pack up and leave?
translation.es: Aguarda. ¿Pretendes que nos marchemos así como si nada?

translation.en: How do we know any of this is even true?
- We don't know you. - I agree. What about our homes?
translation.es: - No te conocemos. - Estoy de acuerdo. ¿Y nuestras casas?

translation.en: - Did you think of that? - Homes? Homes can be rebuilt.
We're talking about lives here. We should do as he says.
translation.es: Esto es de vida o muerte. Debemos hacer lo que dice.

translation.en: Some of us can't carry our livelihood with us, Navid. I don't trust this man.
translation.es: No podemos abandonar nuestro trabajo. No confío en este hombre.

translation.en: No, I don't either. I mean, why should we listen to him?
translation.es: Yo tampoco. ¿Por qué deberíamos hacerle caso?

translation.en: It's true.
This valley is acting like a funnel for monsters fleeing the Elder Dragon.
translation.es: Los monstruos que huyan del dragón anciano pasarán por este valle.

translation.en: - Most likely-- - Most likely?
He's just guessing!
I believe him.
He saved my life.
Aiden, he's not from our village.
translation.es: Aiden, no es de nuestra aldea.

translation.en: What if I go up there and see this for myself?
Well, if you tell us the danger is real, I will believe you.
translation.es: Si tú nos dices que el peligro es real, te creeré.

translation.en: Okay. I will too.
Then you will evacuate?
We have to know.
Take me there.
The Elder Dragon will pass through the valley within a week.
translation.es: El dragón anciano pasará por el valle en una semana.

translation.en: I will take the boy to see with his own eyes the coming danger,
translation.es: Llevaré al niño para que vea por sí mismo el peligro que se avecina,

translation.en: but there can be no delay in your preparations.
You must be ready to leave as soon as he returns.
translation.es: Deben estar listos para irse no bien regrese.

translation.en: We will begin at first light.
This doesn't sound good.
What are you going to do?
- - Now, what to do with you?
I may have use for him.
- Have you hunted Zinogre? - Yes.
- Diablos? - Yes.
Aiden, no!
I had that one.
These monsters are no threat.
translation.es: Estos monstruos no son una amenaza.

translation.en: They're fleeing the Elder Dragon.
There's something I don't get. How come the Guild gets to decide when and what people can hunt?
translation.es: No lo entiendo. ¿Por qué el gremio decide cuándo y qué se puede cazar?

translation.en: A dead monster's a dead monster, isn't it?
Most people once agreed with you.
Ages ago, we hunted monsters indiscriminately
to the point where the natural balance of life was disrupted.
translation.es: al punto de afectar el equilibrio de la naturaleza.

translation.en: The effect on our environment was devastating.
translation.es: Causamos un efecto devastador al medioambiente.

translation.en: It is this very reason that the Hunter's Guild was formed.
translation.es: Fue por eso que se creó el gremio de cazadores.

translation.en: Our balance with nature is more delicate than you think.
translation.es: El equilibrio de la naturaleza es más delicado de lo que crees.

translation.en: Dual Blades.
They work separately, but always together.
translation.es: Funcionan por separado, pero siempre juntas.

translation.en: Always on the offensive.
Overwhelming and outnumbering one's opponent like two unrelenting foes.
translation.es: Se enfrentan al oponente como dos enemigos implacables.

translation.en: The motion is fluid and precise,
like the flow of a stream.
- May I? - Here. Try these first.
Concentrate on your center. You need a stable foundation.
translation.es: Concéntrate en tu centro. Necesitas una base sólida.

translation.en: Don't worry.
We may make a decent Hunter of you yet.
translation.es: Te convertiremos en un cazador decente.

translation.en: Hey. Hey, guys. Wait.
Isn't this distribution of baggage just a little unfair?
translation.es: ¿No es un poco injusta la distribución del equipaje?

translation.en: Oh God.
Nice armor.
You noticed. It's 100% iron ore.
translation.es: Lo notaste. Es de hierro fundido.

translation.en: Velocidrome- tested. Works as a weapon. Got good balance.
translation.es: A prueba de Velocidrome. Funciona como arma, es sólida…

translation.en: Campfire cookware.
Perhaps you need to look the part.
This could fit.
Thank you.
It is Guild- issue.
- Come here. - Aiden.
Come on. Bring it in.
Um, no. No, Aiden.
It's okay. Don't… Don't touch me.
translation.es: No hace falta. No me toques.

translation.en: In case you were wondering…
…there's nowhere you can run that I won't be able to track you, Nox.
translation.es: no hay sitio donde puedas escapar de mí, Nox.

translation.en: Say what? Uh- oh. No. No.
- - Mm- hmm. And get out of my bag.
Who, me? I'm not. I'm right over here.
What?
I don't see anything.
Quiet.
Run!
Nox!
Aiden, no!
Come on!
Climb up here!
That was the scariest thing I've ever seen.
It can't get any worse than that.
Aiden, come up here.
What's that smell?
I was incorrect. It's… - Uh, yeah, it's worse. -
translation.es: Me equivoqué. Sí, eso es peor.

translation.en: Holy moly.
What is that?
That is what you face.
translation.es: Es a lo que te enfrentas.

translation.en: An Elder Dragon.
An unbridled force of nature given flesh,
headed directly for your village.
translation.es: que se dirige a tu aldea.

translation.en: Aiden, you have, at most, three days until your village is destroyed.
translation.es: Aiden, destruirá toda la aldea, como máximo, en tres días.

translation.en: That's an Elder Dragon?
I've tracked it for almost a month. Your people must leave the valley at once.
translation.es: Lo sigo hace un mes. Deben irse de la aldea de inmediato.

translation.en: We'll never make it. The only way out is through the Everwood.
translation.es: No hay tiempo, hay que atravesar el Vergel Eterno.

translation.en: - We'd run right into it. - Then you must go west.
translation.es: - Nos toparemos con él. - Vayan al oeste.

translation.en: The Western Ridge is unpassable.
It would take two weeks to get out of the Elder Dragon's path.
translation.es: Nos llevará dos semanas huir del dragón.

translation.en: - What about the Guild? - They're too far away.
You said so yourself.
Aiden, you've seen the danger.
Convince your people to go west, and you may still save some of them.
translation.es: Convéncelos de ir al oeste y quizá se salven algunos.

translation.en: Remain in the valley, and you will lose everyone.
translation.es: Si se quedan en el valle, todos morirán.

translation.en: Wait, where are you going?
It is my mission to warn every village from here to the ocean to evacuate.
translation.es: Debo advertirle a cada aldea de aquí al océano que huyan.

translation.en: Not just yours.
So, that's it?
You're just gonna walk away?
Well, what if we fight it?
What if we can somehow change its course so it doesn't destroy all those villages?
translation.es: ¿Y si hacemos que cambie su curso para salvar a todas las aldeas?

translation.en: We're Hunters.
We have to do something!
An Elder Dragon is not just another monster.
translation.es: Ese dragón no es un simple monstruo.

translation.en: And you are not a Hunter.
Maybe not. Maybe I've been kidding myself,
translation.es: Quizá no. Quizá esto me supere,

translation.en: but at least I know what it means to be a monster Hunter.
translation.es: pero al menos sé lo que significa ser cazador.

translation.en: I'm not gonna turn my back on Elder Daazel, Burl,
translation.es: No les daré la espalda a la anciana Daazel, Burl,

translation.en: Genovan, Mitul, or Ebbi.
I'll fight with sticks if I have to!
I bring him out here,
and he becomes even more determined to stay.
translation.es: y se convence aún más de quedarse.

translation.en: Care for nature, and it will deliver prosperity.
translation.es: Protege la naturaleza, y recibirás riquezas.

translation.en: Build from prosperity to craft a thriving community.
translation.es: Utiliza la riqueza para crear una comunidad.

translation.en: Live harmoniously in that community
translation.es: Vive en armonía en la comunidad

translation.en: and teach it to always care for nature.
translation.es: y enséñale a proteger la naturaleza.

translation.en: The cycle of balance?
Isn't that what you swore to protect?
That Elder Dragon is destroying nature, and it's about to destroy community.
translation.es: Ese dragón destruye la naturaleza y destruirá la comunidad.

translation.en: If you leave, you're not just abandoning us.
translation.es: Si te vas, no solo nos abandonarás.

translation.en: You're turning your back on what it means to be a Hunter.
Where did you learn that?
This journal belongs to a Hunter.
translation.es: Ese diario es de un cazador.

translation.en: Anyone within range will find us.
translation.es: Si hay alguien cerca, nos encontrará.

translation.en: If we're going to do this, we're going to need some help.
translation.es: Si vamos a hacerlo, necesitaremos ayuda.

translation.en: Yes! It is Alatre- on!
The last entry here is only two days old.
translation.es: La última anotación tiene dos días.

translation.en: - Where did you get it? - I found it in Nox's loot.
translation.es: - ¿Dónde lo hallaste? - Entre las cosas de Nox.

translation.en: Who did you steal this from?
Purr- cured it, please.
Easy on the s- word.
Uh, the thing is, uh, my memory's a little foggy, so…
- Find the owner, and you go free. - Right this way.
translation.es: Si encuentras al dueño, quedarás libre. Por aquí.

translation.en: This is purr- ty close to where I found the Hunter.
translation.es: Encontré a la cazadora cerrrca de aquí.

translation.en: She was camped here for the night.
You guys smell that?
This way. And careful.
The creature she's hunting is extremely dangerous.
translation.es: La criatura que caza es extremadamente peligrosa.

translation.en: Buddy, if we run into trouble, plan A is run away.
translation.es: Amigo, si tenemos problemas, el plan A es huir.

translation.en: Plans C, D, and E are hide,
translation.es: Los planes C, D y E son ocultarse,

translation.en: negotiate, and run away.
There is no plan boomerang.
translation.es: El plan bumerán no es una opción.

translation.en: - - Get out of the way!
- Hey, ugly! Over here. -
Let's see what you got.
You're a lot faster than that last one.
translation.es: Eres más rápido que el anterior.

translation.en: This is high.
Paisley!
Don't worry!
We are here to he--
Ugh. Amateurs.
- They're not coming this way. -
Oh! No, no, no, no!
Oh no!
Can't believe I'm doing this.
Help!
I got you, man. You're gonna be okay.
- - Seriously?
Okay, big guy. Let's see how well you fight.
translation.es: Bueno, grandulón. Veamos qué tan bien peleas.

translation.en: - Ha! You are a nasty one, aren't ya? -
- - Julius!
We'll be perfectly safe now.
- - Nox!
- - Julius! Watch out!
Whoa! No!
- Hey! I'm still up here! - Time for plan boomerang.
translation.es: ¡Oigan! ¡Sigo aquí! Pongamos el plan bumerán en acción.

translation.en: No, no, no! No plan boomerang!
Sure, he gives me the weapon that comes flying back at your face.
translation.es: Claro, me da un arma que casi me quita la cabeza.

translation.en: Give him a big kiss for us.
- No. Shoo. Go away. No. -
I'm back in this.
I'm gonna flank him!
I got a little problem here!
Julius, I think I'm stuck, stuck in the gooey stuff.
translation.es: Julius, creo que estoy atascado en esta cosa pegajosa.

translation.en: Hurry, hurry, hurry, hurry. He's coming.
He's gonna eat me. Hurry!
Watch out!
That… was so cool! That was so cool! Did you see?
Guys, I can't hold this little fella all day.
translation.es: No puedo sostenerlo todo el día.

translation.en: Oh man. I was up in the tree, and then I swung back. I…
translation.es: Cielos. Estaba en el árbol y luego volví.

translation.en: I got a few hits in, and then…
Thanks a bunch, you guys. I only needed another few minutes to ascertain its bite strength and leaping ability.
translation.es: Sí, muy útil. Necesitaba unos minutos para determinar su fuerza y agilidad.

translation.en: And those swords, they're gonna throw the data way off.
translation.es: Esas espadas arruinarán todos mis datos.

translation.en: - You slayed it. - Your partner was in big trouble.
translation.es: - Lo cazaste. - Tu compañero estaba en peligro.

translation.en: And he's lucky this was a juvenile.
I would expect an Ace Hunter to recognize when someone doesn't need help.
translation.es: Un cazador de élite debería saber cuándo no se necesita.

translation.en: Ace Hunter?
- - Yeah, him.
- You, not so much. - Hey.
Nice work, geniuses.
Of course, nobody else takes the time to…  …obtain proper monster data.
translation.es: Claro, nadie se toma el tiempo para obtener datos fidedignos.

translation.en: Just leave it to Mae to do all the legwork, then mess it up when she's almost done.
translation.es: Mae se ocupa de lo difícil, y estropean todo cuando está por terminar.

translation.en: Here I was, thinking I was the only one following up on these reports.
translation.es: Creí que era la única que se encargaba de esto.

translation.en: No? Uh, why are you even here then?
- You're Mae, I'm guessing. - Oh! My journal. Oh! My notes.
translation.es: - Supongo que eres Mae. - Mi diario. Mis notas.

translation.en: Oh!  Oh my gosh. - I thought I'd lost you. - We found it.
translation.es: - Creí que te había perdido. - Lo hallamos.

translation.en: Uh, I mean, well, we found Nox, and he sto--
translation.es: Bueno, hallamos a Nox y él lo ro…

translation.en: Hey, so, uh, should we be concerned about that?
- I'm up here! -
Took me a while to pick up your trail after I saw the flare. Sorry I missed the party.
translation.es: Me tomó un rato seguir tu rastro tras ver la bengala. Lamento llegar tarde.

translation.en: Two Ace Hunters.
- Today must be my lucky day or something. - You two know each other?
translation.es: Hoy debe ser mi día de suerte. ¿Se conocen?

translation.en: They assigned me the region just south of here.
translation.es: Me asignaron la región al sur de aquí.

translation.en: I spotted the smoke on the horizon.
translation.es: Vi el humo en el horizonte.

translation.en: It's headed right into this valley.
translation.es: Se dirige directo a este valle.

translation.en: It's a Lunastra, a big one.
- You've seen it? - Lunastra?
- As in, an Elder Dragon Lunastra? - Uh… Ah…
And you got close to it? What kind of a wingspan did it have?
translation.es: ¿La viste de cerca? ¿Cómo era su envergadura?

translation.en: Was its mane more cobalt blue or closer to periwinkle?
translation.es: ¿La melena era azul cobalto o violeta?

translation.en: Why the flare?
translation.es: ¿Por qué lanzaste la bengala? Todo luce bajo control.

translation.en: Seems like you guys had this one under control. Wait.
translation.es: ¿Por qué lanzaste la bengala? Todo luce bajo control. Espera.

translation.en: No. You're actually going to fight it?
- We could use your help. - Are you kidding?
No one's done a comprehensive assessment of a Lunastra before.
translation.es: Aún nadie evaluó exhaustivamente a una Lunastra.

translation.en: You know what we're asking.
If that time with the Ludroth is any indication,
translation.es: Con lo que pasó con el Ludroth,

translation.en: you do a lot better with me watching your back.
translation.es: es claro que necesitarás mi ayuda.

translation.en: Gargw- awesome.
- What the-- ? - Uh, he does that.
Hey, uh, I… I don't think that guy can breathe in there.
translation.es: Creo que este tipo no puede respirar.

translation.en: Where… Where is that thing?
Did… Did you kill it?
Oh, thank you. You saved my life.
That thing destroyed my whole caravan.
translation.es: Esa cosa destruyó toda mi caravana.

translation.en: You really want to take on an Elder Dragon,
translation.es: Si quieres enfrentarte al dragón anciano,

translation.en: we're gonna need a lot more than armor repairs.
We're gonna need weapons.
Big weapons.
Uh, actually, I was trading with a smithy not far from here.
translation.es: De hecho, estaba negociando con un herrero no muy lejos de aquí.

translation.en: Name of Ravi.
I can show you where to find him,
translation.es: Les diré dónde hallarlo, pero debo advertirles algo…

translation.en: but I should warn you, he is not very fond of visitors.
translation.es: Les diré dónde hallarlo, pero debo advertirles algo… no le agradan mucho los visitantes.

translation.en: - - What? Oh yeah.
I'm sure this guy gets lots of customers every day.
Yeah.
- - Uh, excuse me.
Whatever your business, take it elsewhere.
translation.es: No sé qué buscan aquí, pero lárguense.

translation.en: Uh, please. There's an Elder Dragon coming.
translation.es: Por favor. Se avecina un dragón anciano.

translation.en: - We're trying to stop it. -
We need some…
If you'd just forge some equipment for us, it can make a big difference.
translation.es: Si nos forjas armas, nos ayudarías mucho.

translation.en: I don't forge weapons.
You'll die too!
This Elder Dragon you're so eager to confront,
its life can't be measured by human understanding.
translation.es: Eres incapaz de comprender a qué te enfrentas.

translation.en: It has existed for ages
and will continue to exist long after we're gone.
translation.es: y seguirá existiendo después de nuestra muerte.

translation.en: Compared to that, our lives are small, meaningless things.
translation.es: En comparación, nuestras vidas son pequeñas e insignificantes.

translation.en: Maybe your life has been meaningless, but mine won't be.
translation.es: Quizá tu vida sea insignificante, pero la mía no lo será.

translation.en: Aiden, go.
You, Hunter.
Did you forget how dangerous an Elder Dragon is?
translation.es: ¿Olvidaste cuán peligroso es un dragón anciano?

translation.en: You're walking to your own death, and you're taking this boy with you.
translation.es: Acabarás muerto y matarás a ese niño.

translation.en: He's not doing it for himself, and neither are we.
translation.es: No lo hace porque quiere y nosotros tampoco.

translation.en: Or did you forget what it means to be a Hunter?
You were one, weren't you?
Not… for a long time.
Oh. What's this?
There's been a change of plans, everyone. We're not leaving.
translation.es: Cambio de planes. No nos iremos.

translation.en: We're gonna stay and defend our homes.
translation.es: Nos quedaremos a defender nuestro hogar.

translation.en: - And I've brought us some help. - Wait, what?
There's a natural pinch point just outside the village.
translation.es: Hay un pasaje natural a las afueras de la aldea.

translation.en: If we can guide it right into that spot, we can set a trap for it.
translation.es: Si logramos conducirlo allí, podremos tenderle una trampa.

translation.en: It's a one- of- a- kind Nerscylla stinger.
translation.es: Es un aguijón de Nerscylla único.

translation.en: All kinds of uses.
- Sewing, walking stick-- Ow! -
…tranquilizer.
- And this? - I scouted as far as I could get.
- She's a tough one. - Tracks all over.
translation.es: - Es difícil. - Hay huellas por doquier.

translation.en: Everything for 100 miles has been stirred up by the Lunastra's migration.
translation.es: La migración de la Lunastra destruyó todo en un radio de 150 km.

translation.en: It may work to our advantage.
There are some things we need that we can only get from monsters.
translation.es: Hay cosas que necesitamos que solo los monstruos pueden darnos.

translation.en: Oh brother.
- - Here it comes!
- Where are you guys? - Nox! Nox! Nox!
What are you doin' over there?
Nadia, now.
This way! Hurry!
No, Nox!
- Gotcha, buddy. -
Nice shot.
Mae, we're up.
Julius! Look out! Yellow Mushroom!
All right!
- - Look out.
- Whoa! - Yellow Mushrooms cause paralysis.
Set the trap.
Okay.
- Now! -
Yes!
All right!
Just like you drew it up.
Well done, everyone. That's what teamwork looks like.
translation.es: Bien hecho. Esto es trabajo en equipo.

translation.en: Nice deployment on that trap, Aiden.
translation.es: Buen trabajo con la trampa, Aiden.

translation.en: Thanks. I didn't even need those extra anchors you gave me.
translation.es: Gracias. Ni tuve que usar las anclas que me diste.

translation.en: - You didn't anchor it? - Come on.
Julius, it smells something coming.
Everyone, retreat.
No! We can't just let him get away. Aiden, now's not the time.
translation.es: - ¡No! No podemos dejarlo huir. - Aiden, ahora no.

translation.en: Julius, let me fix this.
- Nox, get that Yellow Mushroom! - What?
Are you crazy?
We can use it to paralyze the Congalala.
translation.es: Podemos usarla para paralizar al Congalala.

translation.en: Aiden, disengage!
Stubborn kid.
Oh sh--
Nox! You good, buddy?
Oh no.
That can't be good. Julius!
Oh no.
Look out!
There's a big monster in front of me.
translation.es: Hay un monstruo enorme frente a mí.

translation.en: Julius, stay down!
Gotcha.
Move it!
Since when did pickles grow teeth?
- Freaking Deviljho! - Deviljho?
Hey, that's got a Dragon Element.
We could totally use that for the Dragonator.
It is on, dragon breath!
- No! - Deviljho?
- That's a Deviljho! - Yeah. Welcome back to reality.
translation.es: - Es un Deviljho. - Sí. Volviste a la realidad.

translation.en: - Julius. - Go!
Oh no!
Mae, we can use the mushroom to paralyze the Jho. Got it.
translation.es: - Usemos la seca para paralizar al Jho. - Entendido.

translation.en: - Get out of here! - We're a team!
Paisley, go!
Got it.
- - Watch out!
Got ya!
- - Watch out!
- Whoa! Yes! -
Everyone all right?
Whoo! Did you see that? Did you see what we just did?
Are you kidding me? I pulled off that sweet block you showed me.
translation.es: ¡Increíble! Me salió el bloqueo que me enseñaste.

translation.en: Your recklessness almost got us all killed.
translation.es: Tu imprudencia casi nos mata a todos.

translation.en: We would've been safe when that Deviljho appeared if you had just listened to me.
translation.es: Habríamos estado a salvo del Deviljho si me hubieras obedecido.

translation.en: When I command you to retreat, you do so.
translation.es: Si te ordeno que te retires, te retiras.

translation.en: No hesitation!
I was wrong about you.
For all of your talk of protecting your village, the only thing that you care about is getting your pat on the back.
translation.es: Dices que quieres proteger a tu aldea, pero solo te interesa recibir validación.

translation.en: Don't you think you're being a--
No, Nadia. I know what I'm seeing.
translation.es: No, Nadia. Sé lo que veo.

translation.en: This is not a team that I can lead. This was always a fool's errand anyway.
translation.es: No puedo liderar este equipo. Sabía que era una causa perdida.

translation.en: Tell everyone to pack up.
Do you think being slightly chewed is gonna hurt the market value?
translation.es: ¿Le baja el precio de mercado que esté algo masticado?

translation.en: I really thought I was improving. Now look at things.
translation.es: Creí que estaba mejorando. Mira lo que hice.

translation.en: Hey, it's not your fault.
No, I messed up again,
translation.es: Sí, metí la pata otra vez,

translation.en: just like getting myself cornered by that Velocidrome.
translation.es: como dejar que el Velocidrome me atrapara.

translation.en: And ruining my Nerscylla research.
And blowing the Congalala trap.
Oh, and don't forget, almost getting us trampled, fried, and devoured by a Deviljho.
translation.es: Y no olvides que, por ti, casi nos pisa, fríe y devora un Deviljho.

translation.en: No big deal.
I'm startin' to think I'm not cut out to be a Hunter.
Oh! And following the fake tracks I made. Yeah, don't forget that one.
translation.es: Y seguir las huellas falsas que hice. Sí, no olvides eso.

translation.en: Yeah. I'm sorry for that day.
translation.es: Sí. Perdón por lo de ese día.

translation.en: For trying to hit you with a hammer, I mean.
translation.es: Por intentar golpearte con un martillo.

translation.en: I'm glad I missed.
So am I, kid. So am I.
translation.es: A mí también, niño. A mí también.

translation.en: - Oh, Aiden! - It's Aiden!
- Everyone all right? - Thank you, thank you.
Heroes, coming through.
- The heroes have returned. - Hey, Aiden!
Thank you, thank you, thank you.
Boy, are we hungry.
Do you remember our first hunt?
Gypceros, wasn't it?
It was the first time you hunted with a Gunner.
translation.es: La primera vez que cazaste con un artillero.

translation.en: You spent half the fight looking over your shoulder, trying to make sure you weren't in the way.
translation.es: Pasaste la mitad de la pelea asegurándote de no estorbar.

translation.en: So, when the thing flashed its crystal to blind us--
translation.es: Y cuando sacó su cristal para cegarnos…

translation.en: Ah, I saw spots for weeks.
Not exactly the smoothest start for Master Kambei's prodigal student.
translation.es: No fue el comienzo ideal para el mejor alumno del maestro Kambei.

translation.en: Why did you follow me, Nadia?
Aiden made a mistake. He's young.
translation.es: Aiden cometió un error. Es joven.

translation.en: His impulsiveness is a problem.
Says the guy who once charged into a Rajang's mating grounds unarmed.
translation.es: Dice el tipo que una vez atacó un nido de Rajang sin armas.

translation.en: That's exactly what worries me.
translation.es: Eso es lo que me preocupa.

translation.en: Says the guy who risked his friend…
translation.es: Dice el tipo que puso en riesgo a su amigo…

translation.en: his mentor's life.
That was not your fault.
We had enough on our hands with the Rathian.
Having a Kushala Daora appear right in the middle of it was a one- in- a- million chance.
translation.es: Jamás hubiéramos podido predecir que justo aparecería un Kushala Daora.

translation.en: Nah, it wasn't that.
I made mistakes. The master had to come in and save me.
translation.es: Cometí errores. El maestro tuvo que venir a salvarme.

translation.en: We were fighting an Elder Dragon.
I did it to impress the master.
translation.es: Lo hice para impresionar al maestro.

translation.en: It wasn't easy training with you.
You were Master Kambei's favorite.
translation.es: Eras el favorito del maestro Kambei.

translation.en: He saw something important in you.
I saw it too, with the Deviljho.
translation.es: Yo también la vi, con el Deviljho.

translation.en: We can't do this without you.
- I'm not that person anymore. - You are.
translation.es: - Ya no soy el mismo de antes. - Claro que sí.

translation.en: That's why I followed you.
Take my weapons.
Just, please stay and lead the others.
translation.es: Por favor, quédate y guía a los demás.

translation.en: Protect Timben.
I acted like a fool.
The people here counted on me, and I let them down.
translation.es: Mi pueblo contaba conmigo y decepcioné a todos.

translation.en: I know you won't lead a team with me on it.
translation.es: Sé que no liderarás un equipo conmigo.

translation.en: We will protect Timben…
together.
Hunters!
You said you needed a smith?
I built it to your design.
Congalala stomach should work fine for the steam housing. Deviljho bones for the bow.
translation.es: La estructura es de estómago de Congalala y el arco es de huesos de Deviljho.

translation.en: Never forged anything like this. Can't promise it'll work.
translation.es: Jamás forjé algo así. No puedo prometer que funcionará.

translation.en: If you're all finished, the village has prepared something special.
translation.es: Si ya terminaron, la aldea les preparó algo especial.

translation.en: You must eat.
What?
To Timben's protectors.
- Good hunting! - Enough, already. Let's eat.
That journal of yours is something.
I think I learned more flipping through it than the rest of my time trying to be a Hunter.
translation.es: Creo que aprendí más al ojearlo que en mi experiencia como cazador.

translation.en: When I was about Ebbi's age, my parents made me write down everything.
translation.es: Cuando tenía la edad de Ebbi, mis padres me obligaban a escribir todo.

translation.en: Needleberries, Flashbugs.
They were researchers. Sticklers for accurate notes.
translation.es: Eran investigadores y me exigían datos precisos.

translation.en: I hated it.
So, I got my Guild license
and accepted a quest that would send me out into the world.
translation.es: acepté una misión para recorrer el mundo.

translation.en: Gone for two full years.
Figures.
I'm about to see an Elder Dragon, and suddenly, I'd give just about anything
translation.es: Estoy a punto de ver un dragón anciano y, de repente, daría lo que fuera

translation.en: to be back sketching bugs and berries with them all over again.
translation.es: por volver a dibujar bichos y bayas con mis padres.

translation.en: Zamite be something wrong with you.
How come you always do that? Make puns out of monster names.
translation.es: ¿Por qué haces juego de palabras con nombres de monstruos?

translation.en: The village I used to live in was destroyed when I was seven, overrun by monsters.
translation.es: Unos monstruos invadieron y destruyeron la aldea en la que vivía de niño.

translation.en: - - I lost my parents.
I spent a long time after that being scared.
translation.es: Pasé mucho tiempo asustado después de eso.

translation.en: Eventually…
I just got tired of it.
I figured, if I learned about monsters and made jokes out of their names,
translation.es: Si aprendía sobre monstruos y hacía bromas con sus nombres,

translation.en: they didn't seem as scary.
Hmm. I'd say, Veloci- diculous.
When I was in Val Habar some years ago,
translation.es: Cuando estuve en Val Habar hace años,

translation.en: I remember rumors of a rogue Hunter.
translation.es: oí rumores de un cazador renegado.

translation.en: They say he turned his back on the Guild's philosophy.
translation.es: Le había dado la espalda a la filosofía del gremio.

translation.en: Started hunting for sport, taking trophies, and selling weapons to fund his habit.
translation.es: Cazaba por deporte, tomaba trofeos y vendía armas para financiar su hábito.

translation.en: You came to me.
If you have something you want to say to me, say it.
translation.es: Si tienes algo que decirme, dímelo.

translation.en: A Hunter can easily lose his way in battle.
translation.es: Un cazador puede perder su camino.

translation.en: Especially alone. When we go out there--
I don't need a sermon from a Hunter willing to risk our lives
translation.es: No necesito un sermón de un cazador que arriesga nuestras vidas

translation.en: to redeem himself from past mistakes.
Past mistakes have a remarkable way of taking us down.
translation.es: Los errores pasados tienen el gran poder de derrotarnos.

translation.en: Well, maybe tomorrow will be a chance for all of us to exorcise some very old monsters.
translation.es: Bueno, quizá mañana todos podamos exorcizar monstruos muy viejos.

translation.en: - Watch out! -
- - Move it.
Come on. I'm not finished eating.
- Everything's ready. - Time to kick some Lun- as- tra.
translation.es: - Listo. - Enviemos a esa Lunastra a la Luna.

translation.en: - Really? - I actually liked that one.
Not the time.
Weapons out.
Whoa. She's huge.
- Cover your ears! -
- I'm out. - Nadia.
- See if you can draw it off. - Got it.
Over here, girl! This way!
She's not going for it.
It's, uh, coming back this way!
Nox, go.
- - Hurry.
Oh! That's a lot of rocks. How did that not work?
translation.es: Son muchas rocas. ¿Por qué no funcionó?

translation.en: It's not going to leave the valley unless we make it.
translation.es: No se irá a menos que la obliguemos.

translation.en: - And now it flies? - It'll burn the village down from the air.
translation.es: - ¿Y ahora vuela? - Quemará la aldea desde arriba.

translation.en: - Ground it! - Coming in!
Oh no, no, no, no!
No!
My brand- new shield!
- Come on! - Look at this thing. It took me six hours.
translation.es: - ¡Vamos! - Mira, me tomó seis horas armarlo.

translation.en: Forget about it! It was terrible anyway.
You're a lot stronger than I imagined.
translation.es: Eres más fuerte de lo que imaginé.

translation.en: - Come on! -
We're going to draw it into position.
Aiden, showtime.
Don't mess it up. Don't mess it up. Don't mess it up. Don't mess it up. Don't mess it up. Don't mess it up.
It's time for plan Dragonator!
translation.es: Pongamos el plan matadragones en acción.

translation.en: It knows!
- The jig is up! - Hit it!
- It didn't work! - The fire damaged it.
translation.es: - No funcionó. - El fuego lo dañó.

translation.en: Use the snare traps. Hold it in position.
translation.es: Usa las trampas. Que no se mueva.

translation.en: The firing mechanism is busted!
translation.es: Se rompió el mecanismo de disparo.

translation.en: Stop the leak in the compressor, let it pressurize. Then you'll have to trigger the Dragonator manually.
translation.es: Debes detener la fuga de vapor, presurizarlo y activarlo manualmente.

translation.en: See if you can fix it.
Hold on.
We can't hold this all day.
Almost have it.
translation.es: No la retendremos mucho más. Ya casi.

translation.en: You're welcome!
- - I'm losing it.
Got it!
I've got you!
- Ravi, get out of there. - Get it from this end.
It's jammed. Hold on!
- Do it! - Ravi, no!
- No!  -
They did it!
- They slayed the Lunastra! - I knew they could!
- Yes! - Everyone, put out the fires.
We did it.
Everyone okay?
- Ravi's dead. - Oh.
- Oh no. -
That's not good.
We had one shot with the Dragonator. What do we do now?
translation.es: Ya no podemos usar el matadragones. ¿Qué hacemos?

translation.en: There's nothing left to do but attack.
translation.es: No podemos hacer más que atacar.

translation.en: Give it everything we've got.
It cannot reach the village.
translation.es: No puede llegar a la aldea.

translation.en: Here. Fight with this.
- Hmm. - Wait.
Dual Blades. They work separately,
but always together.
- Hey, what the-- ? - Aiden, what are you doing?
I have a plan.
Julius, you have to trust me. I need time.
translation.es: Julius, confía en mí. Necesito tiempo.

translation.en: You'll have it. What are you going to do?
translation.es: Te lo conseguiremos. ¿Qué vas a hacer?

translation.en: Restore balance.
Did Aiden just run away with all of my ammunition?
Uh, yeah. He says he needs some time.
No problem. Ideas how to do that?
translation.es: No hay problema. ¿Cómo se lo damos?

translation.en: - Watch out! - Nox!
Get everyone out of the village!
Oh man. It's time for plan panic.
translation.es: Cielos. Es hora del plan pánico.

translation.en: Fall back. Use the buildings for cover.
Julius, the villagers.
Go to them.
- I'm out.  -
Please work. Please work. Please work. Please work.
Please work. Please work. Please work.
Go for its essence.
- The fire's spreading. - More buckets!
- Hurry. We gotta get outta here. - I'm not leaving.
translation.es: - Rápido, debemos irnos. - No me iré.

translation.en: - You have to get out of here. Now. - Here.
translation.es: - Debes irte de aquí. Ahora. - Toma.

translation.en: - Oh no, Ebbi. You have to go. - But I… I'm helping.
translation.es: Ay, no, Ebbi. Tienes que irte. Pero estoy ayudando.

translation.en: Here we go.
Take her.
- No! Stop! -
- Mae. - Oh no.
- - No!
It's dander. It'll ignite the whole village.
translation.es: Ese polvo azul incendiará toda la aldea.

translation.en: Go! Go! Run!
Get out!
No!
- The Gargwa coops! -
Son of a…
Spark. Spark. Spark. Spark. Spark. Spark.
Yes!
Ha- ha! Plan boomerang saves the day.
translation.es: El plan bumerán salva el día.

translation.en: What was Aiden's idea again?
Go!
Watch out!
Your sacrifice will never be forgotten.
Because of you, the balance of nature
translation.es: Gracias a ustedes, esta aldea recuperará el equilibrio con la naturaleza.

translation.en: can be brought back to this village.
translation.es: esta aldea recuperará el equilibrio con la naturaleza.

translation.en: Thank you.
There is no blame.
It was their choice.
They followed you into an unwinnable battle.
translation.es: Te siguieron a una batalla imposible de ganar.

translation.en: To treat it as anything less would diminish what they gave. And why.
translation.es: No tomarlo así quitaría valor al motivo de su sacrificio.

translation.en: No. It wasn't me they followed.
translation.es: No. No me siguieron a mí.

translation.en: They followed something larger, a balance each of us hope to find.
translation.es: Siguieron algo superior, un equilibrio que todos deberíamos hallar.

translation.en: - - Here. This is Mae's journal.
translation.es: Toma. Es el diario de Mae.

translation.en: You keep it. It has instructions to make that Rathalos antidote in it.
translation.es: Quédatelo. Tiene instrucciones para hacer el antídoto de Rathalos.

translation.en: I made my own journal to start my own path…
translation.es: Inicié mi propio diario para comenzar mi propio camino…

translation.en: just like Mae.
Timben will be in good hands with you here to protect it.
translation.es: Timben estará en buenas manos si tú la proteges.

translation.en: Hold up! Wait!
Where will you go next?
Dundorma.
The Guild will need to know what happened here.
translation.es: El gremio debe saber qué pasó aquí.

translation.en: I want to come with you.
There's a bigger picture out there, beyond me, beyond Timben.
translation.es: Hay cosas más importantes que yo, que Timben.

translation.en: You taught me that the night we first saw the Lunastra.
translation.es: Me lo enseñaste cuando vimos a la Lunastra.

translation.en: There are bigger threats out there.
If I'm gonna face them, I need to become an Ace Hunter.
translation.es: Para enfrentarlas, debo convertirme en un cazador de élite.

translation.en: That's a good hmm. I've known him a long time.
translation.es: Esa interjección fue positiva. Lo conozco hace mucho.

translation.en: And if I am translating correctly, that means,
translation.es: Si no me equivoco con la traducción, significa: Aiden, has mejorado mucho.

translation.en: Why, Aiden, you've come such a long way.
I would be thrilled to take you on as my cadet.
translation.es: Me encantaría que fueras mi cadete.

translation.en: - - That's ama- Zinogre!
Hey, some people like my puns. Right, Nadia?
translation.es: A algunos les gustan mis chistes. ¿Cierto, Nadia?

translation.en: That one was bad.
That was pretty fantastic.
Yeah, like that story about you taking on the Zamtrios.
translation.es: Como la historia de que combatiste los Zamtrios.

translation.en: Hey, that really happened, okay? I came under it. I swept, all right?
translation.es: Oye, eso pasó de verdad, ¿sí? Le di una gran paliza.

translation.en: This wasn't one of those stories,
translation.es: Esto no fue una de esas historias,

translation.en: was it?
Read this.
Wow. It's Mae's last entry to her parents.
translation.es: Es la última anotación de Mae a sus padres.

translation.en: I have enjoyed every moment of my journey.
translation.es: He disfrutado cada momento de mi viaje.

translation.en: Father and Mother, you have taught me well.
translation.es: Padre y madre, aprendí mucho de ustedes.

translation.en: I think I understand now why this world needs a Guild
translation.es: Creo que ahora entiendo por qué el mundo necesita al gremio

translation.en: and people like you to teach them how to live in harmony.
translation.es: y a personas como ustedes para enseñarles a vivir en armonía.

translation.en: Tonight, I joined a team of Hunters.
translation.es: Hoy me uní a un equipo de cazadores.

translation.en: The mission we are going on is truly dangerous.
I fear it may be my last,
translation.es: Temo que sea mi última misión,

translation.en: but interestingly, I'm not afraid.
For these Hunters I fight with are intelligent, caring, courageous,
translation.es: Porque los cazadores que me acompañan son astutos, bondadosos, valientes

translation.en: and they brighten my world.
My heart is filled with hope.
